description: Since the dawn of FuckingMachines.com in 1999, members, fans, crew, models, and your mama have asked us to shoot the scene from Barbarella with the Orgasmatron - the machine that is supposed to be death by orgasms for the fearless sex crusader, Barbarella. Our extraordinarily talented crew of set designers, production staff, editors and models have recreated Barbarella as a cross site feature update. This update is the last in the series and the final sex machine face of for the evil Dylan Ryan and the angel, Lorelei Lee. Watch our remake of this incredibly sexy movie and see what happens under that black curtain and all over our science lab. You can see the other installments of this episodic movie on UltimateSurrender, Electrosluts, DivineBitches, Whipped Ass and Sex and Submission.
title: THE LONG AWAITED ORGASMATRON SHOOT - BARBARELLA PARODY FEATURE
